mapper.select: select * from w_acc_st.W_OP_PRM_PARA_VER where PARM_TYPE_ID = #{id} order by record_flag,version_no
select * from w_acc_st.W_OP_PRM_PARA_VER where PARM_TYPE_ID = #{id} and record_flag='0'
select max(version_no) version_no_max from w_acc_st.W_OP_PRM_PARA_VER where PARM_TYPE_ID = #{parm_type_id} and record_flag in('0','1','2','4') and substr(version_no,1,8)=#{version_valid_date}
mapper.update: update w_acc_st.W_OP_PRM_PARA_VER set version_date=sysdate,operator_id=#{operator_id}, begin_time=to_date(concat(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), end_time=to_date(concat(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') where parm_type_id=#{parm_type_id} and record_flag='3' and version_no='0000000000'
